name: elyk
body:
### About
I'm a technical architect at [Tivix](http://www.tivix.com/), where I help run our NYC office. My day usually consists of solving problems with software - either planning, coding, or fixing.  

I try to work on side projects when I have the time and most recently, this has been [BugTower](https://bugtower.com/), a Python/Django web app + iOS app for bug tracking. 

### Contact
Feel free to reach out - kyle@elyk.me
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
